p: With the involvement of the yjbI and the yjbH genes in protease and pigment production, surface protein production and pathogenicity of S. aureus, we speculated YjbH might be involved in regulating the expression of various genes. Therefore, we performed RNA-seq analysis. We found that disruption of both the genes led to significant changes in the expression of the genes from diverse pathways. We found similar expression patterns among the yjbI and yjbH genes- disrupted mutants with a common upregulation and downregulation of 70 and 79 genes, respectively. ( Figure 5(a,b), Supplementary Table S1, S2).
